Hi,

Hey,

Few more changes to this page -

Could we please update the 'Key Features' section to the following (infographics attached):

  1. Made from FilaSorb™

  2. Designed for acoustic comfort (ear infographic)

  3. Made from recycled content

  4. Custom available

  5. Certified low VOC

  6. Easy to clean and sanitize (spray bottle infographic)

  7. Porous, absorbent and breathable surface (bacteria infographic)

  8. Quick lead times within Aus (clock infographic)



Could we also please contract the 'mounting options' section slightly so it's less wide? Its currently taking up too much space.

I'd also like to replace the SECTION 2 image with this pic: https://www.dropbox.com/home/Acoufelt%20Marketing/001%20Marketing%20Global/Mobile%20Acoustics/Product%20Photos/Final%20Images/Renders?preview=IM_1.jpg

Also please update the spec sheet download to the updated version attached.

Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy, 

Ok sure, confirming we have updated as requested:
https://acoufelt.com/au/open-office-solutions/

Thanks!

Few extra changes -

SECTION 1:

Update text to DESK SOLUTIONS FOR SAFE & HEALTHY WORKING

The Acoufelt collection of Desk Solutions represents a series of desk modules for safe and healthy working, with increased acoustic comfort.

SECTION 2:

Change heading text to: Privacy, flexibility, and modern aesthetic design

Change subtext to be:

Employees and employers are looking for safe and healthy spaces to work, where they can keep a safe distance from one another, yet still feel connected. There is a rising demand for clever interior design that facilitates safe social distancing practices, accommodates the flexibility of the new workspace and the transition back to the office, and incorporates materials that are easy to clean and safe for human use.

Designed for spatial privacy and safe social distancing within open-plan and shared spaces, Desk Solutions also reduce ambient noise and visual distractions whilst accommodating collaboration and human connectivity.

Please increase the size of the font here too.

SECTION 3:

Update the 3 photographs to the attached - we want to see what this looks like.

Please change the bottom text to black instead of grey.

Please remove the shadow effect from images.

SECTION 4:

Can we please have this image extent all the way to the RHS - like section 2. Please left align text on LHS to match.

Update sentence at bottom to be: Desk modules are comprised of acoustic FilaSorb™ material for increased sound absorption. Products made from FilaSorb™ meet the highest standards for human safety, and are also easy to clean and treat.

Please increase the size of the font here too.

SECTION 6:

Could we please remove the shadow effect from the images. Could we also please reduce the size of these images and contract this section so that it's narrower on the page and taking up less space.

Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

Hi Lucy, 

Ok sure, confirming we have made these updates now too.
